revised_title: A Pioneering Geologist: Darashaw Nosherwan Wadia's Contributions to Indian Geology
tldr: Darashaw Nosherwan Wadia was a prominent Indian geologist who made significant contributions to the understanding of the geology and geotectonics of the Himalayas. He also played a crucial role in shaping India's geological, mining, and scientific landscape. Wadia's dedication to education and his international outlook led him to make lasting impacts on the field of geology in India and beyond.
